Detailed Description

Provides per-user and per-application settings associated with this application.

Property Documentation

ApplicationSettings TwinEditor.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.Default [static, get]

Gets the default instance of these settings.

This instance is statically initialized.

Gets or sets the recently opened files on a per-user level.

Gets or sets the length of the recently opened files list on a per-user level.

Gets or sets the name of the ISynchronizationStrategy to be used by default on a per-user level.

Gets or sets the configured username on a per-user level.
